errors.error_description: The path to the ISS Mimic logo image is incorrect, pointing to a directory '.../Pi/img/main/...' when it should be '.../Pi/imgs/main/...', causing the image not to load.
correction_candidates: Change the image URL path from `.../Pi/img/main/...` to `.../Pi/imgs/main/...`.
Change the image URL to use the `main` branch instead of `master`.
Replace the GitHub blob URL with a raw content URL from `raw.githubusercontent.com`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the image URL path from `.../Pi/img/main/...` to `.../Pi/imgs/main/...`.
